Description:
The VGDC's favorite restaurant has been overrun with the undead... even with a helping of free soda, how long can you survive?

This map is a close quarters survival map themed around a small Chinese restaurant with random stuff related to the Video Game Development Club @ NC State.

Features:
[list]
[*] 7 Perks and Pack-a-Punch (no perk limit)
[*] BO4 and BO3 weapons
[*] Custom Pick-a-Perk Soda Machine Mechanic
[*] Many custom Models and Textures
[*] Free Soda Easter Egg (One Piece related)
[*] Too many inside jokes
[/list]

This is the first map I've made for bo3 and it was made as a submission to the 2023 VGDC fall game jam. Please let me know of any bugs or issues you encounter in the discussions.

Credits:
[list]
[*] diegogarcia_05 on Sketchfab for the [url=https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/soda-fountain-machine-344bb30c8c02401fa0bd21e5be84eca9] Soda Fountain Machine [/url]
[*] Maxwell for his artwork
[*] Carson and Jack Grack for their likeness
[*] Jayden for the dragon
[*] Shadows music/zombies, bo4 weapons, and mystery boxes from devraw.net
[*] [url=https://youtu.be/IkO8hTb7hL0?si=io12MBvaxiaUYCd_]One piece[/url]
[/list]
